Smash: Out of The Box: Now!

You can navigate to your home directory in a terminal session and type the following commands to smash out of the box.

git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/hypersoft/smash.git; cd smash; make && sudo make install;

now remove the build-kit:

cd ../; rm -vrf smash;

The git tool is currently required to smash out of the box because smash doesn't have a binary release package at this time.
